content: today we are making new stylish baby flat booties shoes pattern this shoes crocheted for baby sizes from 0-3 months to 2 years in the pattern below we explain more sizes we mention about for all sizes also in my video tutorial watch full video in details this adorable crochet baby booties work up quick easy with new and modern style easy to wear kids for winter season to protect babies feet you will find here most baby patterns like baby sandals and booties slipper design baby jacket patterns baby caps baby blanket patterns baby pullover sweaters baby hooded patterns for new born to other many sizes share my own creations
